name: Achievement Collector: Space
description: Achievement Collector: Space in this 2d action / shooter you play as a spaceship that kills spaceman that escaped. shoot the spaceman with LASERS!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 240 GT Storage: 350 MB available space
